holidays.title: World Oceans Day
holidays.description: Dive in and do your part to keep big blue going strong.

holidays.title: Bounty Day
holidays.description: A mutiny triumphed always calls for a celebration that transcends time.

holidays.title: International Day of Action for Elephants in Zoos
holidays.description: Help raise awareness about elephant conservation and protection by doing your part.

holidays.title: Name Your Poison Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates our ability to choose the ‘poison’ that will be the least harmful to us.

holidays.title: National Cancer Thriver Day
holidays.description: Observe National Cancer Thriver Day to celebrate those surviving cancer and those thriving after beating it!

holidays.title: National Kids Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Kids Day by celebrating the precious kids in your life.

holidays.title: Pentecost
holidays.description: Pentecost marks the beginning of the Christian church’s mission into the world.

holidays.title: Pentecost Orthodox
holidays.description: Pentecost Orthodox is celebrated fifty days after Easter in the Orthodox Church.

holidays.title: Race Unity Day
holidays.description: Bahá'í is the original sponsor of Race Unity Day but it can be celebrated by anyone.

holidays.title: Temotu Province Day
holidays.description: Learn about the history of these beautiful islands as we honor and celebrate this special day.

holidays.title: Thomas Paine Day
holidays.description: Reason and human rights were his strides in life. Let’s learn more about Thomas Paine.

holidays.title: Upsy Daisy Day
holidays.description: This quirky holiday encourages you to embrace positivity and usher brightness into your life.

holidays.title: Whit Sunday
holidays.description: It is Whit Sunday, the day to commemorate the establishment of the Church.

holidays.title: World Brain Tumor Day
holidays.description: Wear your gray ribbons as we work hard to support this community.

holidays.title: Cody Rigsby’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the vibrant Cody Rigsby, success in life comes from persistence and dreaming big.

holidays.title: Harley Reese’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young talent is just beginning her journey to success, and we love to see it!

holidays.title: Joan Rivers’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this matriarch, she can rest in knowing the impact she made is immortal.

holidays.title: Kanye West’s Birthday
holidays.description: Love him or not, this singer, rapper, producer, and designer is unforgettable.

holidays.title: Michael FamilyFunPack’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no limit to what this cute and talented YouTube Star can achieve.
